title: I factory reset my Google Pixel, but the PIN I used before doesn't work.
content: I tried entering in my old PIN, but it didn't work. At the time, the representative from Google told me I needed to email them the code on my SIM card. But then I never got an email follow up after our chat and I can't find chat support anymore.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 2
